attributes.action: Ban the use and selling of fireworks to the general public.
attributes.additional_details: I am wanting to petition for fireworks to be used at displays only. I am aware there is currently no interest whatsoever from the government to do this. However myself & thousands of others across the UK strongly feel VERY differant. Thousands of parents with children of special needs i.e adhd autism sprectrum disorder noise sensory issues ect, adults with ptsd kids and teens with ptsd, vunerable older people with ptsd.  Aids such as ear defenders,meds ect isnt enough. We shouldnt live like this
attributes.background: Ban the use and selling of fireworks to the general public.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
